website_summaries.verdict: Brightly colored dinnerware that will create the right mood at any winter gathering.
pros: Amazing artwork and colors make this set memorable
Contains 5 pieces per setting, which is more than other sets
Consists of fine bone china with gold banding to create a sense of elegance
cons: This set is only for one person, so it's expensive versus other holiday dinnerware

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful cup & saucer and even prettier in person than ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cup & saucer and even prettier in person than the picture. Delivered very quickly and in perfect condition. Very well packaged. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, elegant and festive
customer_reviews.text: I have the regular Old Country Roses china, but I also have a set of the Christmas tree salad plates that I use at Christmas. It turns my regular set into a Christmas set and makes such a pretty table.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Love this cake plate 💖🌲💝
customer_reviews.text: I love this purchase!! I already want to purchase more holiday items in this pattern. They compliment my Old Country Roses dinnerware set. Great for entertaining. I will order another after the Christmas rush so I have 2 for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Mezatis

customer_reviews.title: very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Love this royal Albert country roses christmas collection! Its very beautiful! It however didn't come with the royal Albert stickers on the backs of the dishes likeall the other royal Albert dishes have.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: A High Tea Plate for Christmas! Great Idea!
customer_reviews.text: Combined with the Royal Albert Christmas Mug, a plate of cookies almost made for a Christmas High Tea. My mother loved it.
customer_reviews.author: dredaker

customer_reviews.title: Christmas dishes..
customer_reviews.text: These dishes make for a lovely table setting. They are of high quality and will be sure to be heirlooms for our family. We look forward to getting them out for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not shipped in original box
customer_reviews.text: Was not in original box. I do not know if this item is new. I was going to give this as a gift, but I do not feel that it can be given because I do not think its new.
customer_reviews.author: nurseact

customer_reviews.title: Love the unique design
customer_reviews.text: Love this Royal Albert holiday cup and saucer. Would like to have a few more.
customer_reviews.author: marjie mader

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are a collector of Old Country Roses - these plates are a must for Christmas. They complement the design of the original pattern, yet add a stunning holiday elegance to the table. You will not be disappointed with these stunning bone china Christmas tree dessert plates.
customer_reviews.author: 3catsandme

customer_reviews.title: I like my christmas plates
customer_reviews.text: I like very much my plates and l am very happy because l have these christmas plates .The delivery was excellent and the packages were sent without fault .
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Tzerefou

customer_reviews.title: Plates
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for these a long time. So happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: These were great gifts for our granddaughter to go along with a Tea Party.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Prettier than it's image
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful gift for a friend and very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: MeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Royal Albert Old Country Roses
customer_reviews.text: I like Royal Albert products in general,and this one in particular, saw it on Amazon. I will continue to bye similar stuff for my dinner collection.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: It's too pretty and will like it
customer_reviews.text: It's too pretty and will like it. Ribbon is a little darker than expected, but the red so it is inherent in the Royal Albert more fancy. A satisfactory procurement.
customer_reviews.author: kimsol

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly lovely!
customer_reviews.text: A Christms gift to my daughter-in-law, and she loves it for her afternoon tea time. So glad I was able to find the perfect one for her!
customer_reviews.author: Janice H. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Purchased it for a present for my daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: pretty but heavy
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty, but heavy because it's not porcelain or bone china - as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaC

customer_reviews.title: Old Country Roses Christmas Tree pattern is my favorite! The teacup and saucer arrived in perfect condition ...
customer_reviews.text: Old Country Roses Christmas Tree pattern is my favorite! The teacup and saucer arrived in perfect condition for the Christmas Season to add to my growing collection. The china is so elegant and lovely. I hosted a wonderful Christmas tea party for my friends. The china was admired by all and makes sharing a cup of tea with friends a very special event.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: ... of Royal Albert is the one of the most beautiful ever.
customer_reviews.text: This collection of Royal Albert is the one of the most beautiful ever... I am a great fan of Royal Albert China and i just loved the quality and the perfection of the pieces. The seller is fantastic, fast shipping and everything arrived perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waited all my life to find my "Christmas" china pattern that I liked, finally, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful, festive, lovely, elegant, and just perfect for my first and what will be my only Christmas Pattern China. I adore it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret J.

customer_reviews.title: They loved the delicacy
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit with tea lovers as a Christmas gift. Have family friends that are hard to buy for. They are tea lovers who have many tea cups. They loved the delicacy, design and cheerfulness of this gift. Wish I had purchased an extra for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My daughter did not have enough place settings of the Christmas pattern so she matched it with the regular Royal Albert China....her table looked beautiful and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Darianne

customer_reviews.title: Christmas tea, a nice addition!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful piece to add to my collection. I would recommend it if you are collecting this set.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher5

customer_reviews.title: This is not my favorite Christmas teacup of my collection
customer_reviews.text: This is not my favorite Christmas teacup of my collection, but it is a lovely addition nonetheless. If you are a fan of Royal Doulton's Old Country Roses pattern, you will love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Christmas tea cup
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Christmas tea cup for that perfect cup of tea!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty Christmas pattern
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift, and the recipient absolutely loves the place setting and the festive pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Catalyst

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Christmas dishes
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful! I love mixing and matching them with my Old Country Roses pattern. You can make very few pieces go a long ways by mixing them with the traditional pattern. I hope to add on by next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, good weight.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom and MIL for Xmas. It's exactly as pictured - a smallish, lovely Christmas plate. Great details, and a nice feeling of weight to it. They were delivered individually, each very well-wrapped to avoid damage.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Marie Torreson

customer_reviews.title: Old Country Rose Christmas Tree Oval Platter
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift to add to my wife's collection this Christmas. I now know what is the perfect gift for that special someone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exquisite and price could not be beat easily and arrived quickly was a beautiful transaction
customer_reviews.author: bryan keith bryson

customer_reviews.title: Old Country Rose Christmas Collection
customer_reviews.text: What a hit with the wife by giving this gift to her this Christmas. Talk about a perfect gift! Ya can go wrong with Royal Douton
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely Christmas cup and saucer.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful workmanship. This is a great addition to any Christmas china collection.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Teacup
customer_reviews.text: I collect teacups and was happy when this came because it was beautiful and made a good addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A delightful addition to my Christmas teacup collection for having grandchildren share Christmas tea!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri H

customer_reviews.title: She was very surprised and happy with the gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife has this pattern for her china collection. She was very surprised and happy with the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Santerre

product_meta.title: Royal Albert Old Country Roses Christmas Tree Place Setting, 5-Piece
product_meta.description: Style Name:5-PIECE PLACE SETTINGRoyal albert old country roses Christmas tree collection adds a seasonal touch and warmth to any table. This Christmas tree salad plate features a beautifully decorated Christmas tree outlined with a holiday themed old country roses design and iconic gold rim.
feature_bullets: 5-Piece place setting for the Royal Albert Old County Roses Christmas dinnerware pattern
Features beautiful roses in vivid colors with leaves, free flowing ribbons, and a Christmas tree on a plain white background
Makes any holiday gathering more elegant and special

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
